content.rendered:
Deep Scan Recovery is a feature of Dumpster that utilizes cutting-edge technology that we have been developing. Deep Scan Recovery allows you to recover previously deleted photos, images and files stored on your device.

Deep Scan Recovery is limited in the basic version of Dumpster. You can access unlimited recovery in Dumpster Premium.

Here are a few options available in Deep Scan Recovery to recover your file:

  • Delete
    Permanently delete files.
  • Restore
    This will send the file to the device’s main gallery (Google Photos for instance). The file will be located inside the “Restored” album.
  • Share
    You can easily share the file via any messaging app (Whatsapp, Telegram, Messenger, etc.)

Find out more about Dumpster Premium here
